valid(Action, Object, Map<String, String>) - Method in interface javax0.wtf.Validator
Decides whether the user input is valid for the action.
Validator - Interface in javax0.wtf
Classes implementing a validator have to implement this interface.
ValidatorDefinition - Interface in javax0.wtf
 
ValidatorFailedException - Exception in javax0.wtf.exceptions
This exception is thrown by a workflow method doAction and doPostAction when the action can not be executed fully because the validator returned false.
ValidatorFailedException() - Constructor for exception javax0.wtf.exceptions.ValidatorFailedException
